name: Sid The Snake (itch)
description:
Sid the Snake is an analogue twist on the classic 'Snake' formula. Sid is a simple but agile thing, who is adept at squiggling in order to dodge dangerous mines and asteroids.

Eating eggs will help Sid to shed its skin and become more powerful so it can fight back against the world. Sid has a very short lifespan, only three minutes, but within that time it's determined to fulfill its lifelong ambition, which is to eat a mouse.

  • Super hard, fast addictive arcade action.
  • Four powerups to unlock
  • An even harder difficulty setting for the more tenacious players.
  • Retro look, inspired by Asteroids and Tron
